docblock.description: This file houses the MpmMigration class.
The MpmMigration is an abstract template class used as the parent to all migration classes.
Migrates the database up.
Migrates down (reverses changes made by the up method).
This file houses the MpmMysqliMigration class.
The MpmMysqliMigration is an abstract template class used as the parent to all migration classes which use mysqli.
Migrates the database up.
Migrates down (reverses changes made by the up method).
This file houses the MpmSchema class.
The MpmSchema class is used to build an initial database structure.
Either a PDO or an ExceptionalMysqli object used to talk to the MySQL database.
The timestamp of the migration which, when the schema is built, will be considered the current migration.
docblock.long-description:
All migrations prior to this timestamp will be ignored when building the database.

Timestamp should be in CCYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

docblock.description: Object constructor.
Removes all of the tables in the database.
Clears the migrations table and then rebuilds it.
Used to build the schema.
docblock.long-description: All SQL statements needed to create the initial database structure should be run here.

This file houses the MpmClassUndefinedException class.
MpmClassUndefinedException should be thrown when a class is being instantiated but it is not yet defined.

MpmDatabaseConnectionException should be thrown if we can't connect to the database.
This file houses the MpmMalformedQueryException class.
MpmMalformedQueryException should be thrown if MySQL rejects a query.
This file houses the MpmAutoloadHelper class.
The MpmAutoloadHelper class contains a single static method which is added to the stack of class autoloaders.
docblock.long-description: Whenever a class is instantiated which hasn't already been included, this method will be called to try to dynamically include the proper class.

tag.description: the name of the class being instantiated
